acolyte.name: Acolyte
trait: I venerate a distinct hero of my faith, and persistently reference that individual's accomplishments and lessons.
I can find universal ground between the most vehement enemies, sympathizing with them and always moving toward unity.
I see portents in all things. The gods attempt to communicate to us, we just need to pay attention.
Nothing can rattle my positive attitude.
I quote (or misquote) holy scripture and aphorisms in nearly all circumstances.
I am accepting (or unaccepting) of other faiths and honor (or dishonor) the devotion to other deities.
I've enjoyed exquisite food, drink, and aristocracy among my faith's most elite. Rougher lifestyles chafe me.
I've spent so much time in the confines of the temple that I have few functional skills interacting with individuals in the rest of the world.
ideal: Tradition: The age-old institutions of devotion and forfeiture must be sustained and maintained. (Lawful)
Charity: I always attempt to assist those in need, regardless of the personal cost. (Good)
Change: We must help induce the developments the gods are continually cultivating in the world. (Chaotic)
Power: I aspire to someday ascend to the elite of my faith's highest echelon. (Lawful)
Faith: I believe that my deity will direct my work. I have confidence that if I work diligently, my work will be rewarded. (Lawful)
Aspiration: I aim to demonstrate myself worth my deity's favor by paralleling my actions against their instruction. (Any)
bond: I would sacrifice anything to recover a long lost ancient relic of my temple (or faith).
I will get revenge on my temple's corrupted hierarchy that branded me a heretic.
I can never repay what I owe to the priest that took me in as an orphan.
Everything I do is for those less fortunate.
I will do whatever is necessary to keep my temple safe.
I safeguard holy scripture that some claim is heretical and seek to destroy.
flaw: I hold others to a high standard, and myself even higher.
I place too much faith in those most powerful within my temple's hierarchy.
My religiosity can lead me to naively trust those that claim faith in my deity.
I am very stubborn in my thinking.
I am pessimistic and distrustful of strangers.
Once I choose an objective, I become so single minded that the rest of my life fades into the background.

shelter of the faithful.description: I command the respect of those who share my faith. I can perform the religious ceremonies of my faith. My companions and I can expect free healing and care at an establishment of my faith, though I must provide any material components needed for spells. Those who share my religion will support me at a modest lifestyle.

FightingStyles.name: Archery Fighting Style
FightingStyles.description: +2 bonus to attack rolls I make with ranged weapons

atkCalc: if (isRangedWeapon) {output.extraHit += 2; };
My ranged weapons get a +2 bonus on the To Hit.

FightingStyles.name: Defense Fighting Style
FightingStyles.description: +1 bonus to AC when I'm wearing armor
FightingStyles.eval: AddACMisc(1, 'Defense Fighting Style', 'When wearing armor, the class feature Defense Fighting Style gives a +1 bonus to AC', 'CurrentArmour.known && !ArmourList[CurrentArmour.known].type')
FightingStyles.removeeval: AddACMisc(0, 'Defense Fighting Style', 'When wearing armor, the class feature Defense Fighting Style gives a +1 bonus to AC')

FightingStyles.name: Dueling Fighting Style
FightingStyles.description: +2 to damage rolls when wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons

atkCalc: var areOffHands = function(n){for(var i=1;i<=n;i++){if ((/off.hand.attack/i).test(What('Bonus Action ' + i))) {return true; }; }; }(FieldNumbers.actions); if (!areOffHands && isMeleeWeapon && !isNaturalWeapon && !(/\b(2|two).?hand(ed)?s?\b/i).test(theWea.description)) {output.extraDmg += 2; };
When I'm wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no weapon in my other hand, I do +2 damage with that melee weapon. This condition will always be false if the bonus action 'Off-hand Attack' exists.

FightingStyles.name: Great Weapon Fighting Style
FightingStyles.description: Reroll 1 or 2 on damage if wielding two-handed/versatile melee weapon in both hands

atkAdd: if (isMeleeWeapon && (/\b(versatile|(2|two).?hand(ed)?s?)\b/i).test(theWea.description)) {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'Re-roll 1 or 2 on damage die' + ((/versatile/i).test(fields.Description) ? ' when two-handed' : ''); };
While wielding a two-handed or versatile melee weapon in two hands, I can re-roll a 1 or 2 on any damage die once.

FightingStyles.name: Protection Fighting Style
FightingStyles.description: As a reaction, I can give disadv. on an attack made vs. someone within 5 ft of me. I need to be wielding a shield and be able to see the attacker to do this

FightingStyles.name: Two-Weapon Fighting Style
FightingStyles.description: I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks

atkCalc: if (isOffHand) {output.modToDmg = true; };
When engaging in two-weapon fighting, I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks.

Classes.name: Barbarian
skills: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival.
Classes.equipment: Barbarian starting equipment: A greataxe -or- any martial melee weapon; Two handaxes -or- any simple weapon; An explorer's pack and four javelins.Alternatively, choose 2d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

rage.name: Rage
rage.description: Start/end as bonus action; add damage to melee weapons that use Str; lasts 1 min. Adv. on Strength checks/saves (not attacks); resistance to bludgeoning/piercing/slashing. Stops if I end turn without attacking or taking damage since last turn, or unconscious
rage.additional: levels.map(function(n) {if (n< 9)return '+2 melee damage';if (n< 16)return '+3 melee damage';return '+4 melee damage';})

text: Adv. on Str saves in rage

atkCalc: if (isMeleeWeapon && classes.known.barbarian && classes.known.barbarian.level && (/\brage\b/i).test(WeaponText)) {output.extraDmg += function(n){return n < 9 ? 2 : n < 16 ? 3 : 4;}(classes.known.barbarian.level); };
If I include the word 'Rage' in a melee weapon's name or description, the calculation will add my Rage's bonus damage to it.

unarmored defense.name: Unarmored Defense
unarmored defense.description: Without armor, my AC is 10 + Dexterity modifier + Constitution modifier + shield

reckless attack.name: Reckless Attack
reckless attack.description: Adv. on melee weapon attacks during my turn, but attacks vs. me adv. until next turn

danger sense.name: Danger Sense
danger sense.description: Adv. on Dexterity saves against seen effects (not blinded/deafened/incapacitated)

text: Adv. on Dex saves vs. seen effects

subclassfeature3.name: Primal Path
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a Primal Path that shapes the nature of your rage and put it in the "Class" field. Choose either the Path of the Battlerager, Berserker, or Totem Warrior

fast movement.name: Fast Movement
fast movement.description: I gain +10 ft speed when I'm not wearing heavy armor

feral instinct.name: Feral Instinct
feral instinct.description: Adv. on Initiative; I can enter rage to act normally on the first turn when surprised
feral instinct.eval: Checkbox('Init Adv', true, 'Advantage to Initiative checks was gained from Barbarian (Feral Instinct)');

brutal critical.name: Brutal Critical
brutal critical.description: I can roll additional dice for the extra damage on a critical hit with a melee attack
brutal critical.additional: levels.map(function(n) {if (n< 9)return '';if (n< 13)return '1 additional die';if (n< 17)return '2 additional die';return '3 additional dice';})

atkAdd: if (isMeleeWeapon && classes.known.barbarian && classes.known.barbarian.level > 8 && (/d\d+/).test(fields.Damage_Die)) {var pExtraCritM = extraCritM ? extraCritM : 0; var extraCritM = pExtraCritM + function(n){return n < 13 ? 1 : n < 17 ? 2 : 3;}(classes.known.barbarian.level); if (pExtraCritM) {fields.Description = fields.Description.replace(pExtraCritM + 'd', extraCritM + 'd'); } else {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + extraCritM + fields.Damage_Die.replace(/.*(d\d+).*/, '$1') + ' extra on a crit in melee'; }; };
My melee attacks roll additional dice on a critical hit.

relentless rage.name: Relentless Rage
relentless rage.description: [DC 10 + 5 per try, per short rest] If I drop to 0 HP while raging, I can make a DC 10 Constitution save to stay at 1 HP. The DC increases by 5 for every attempt until I finish a short or long rest
relentless rage.usagescalc: var FieldNmbr = parseFloat(event.target.name.slice(-2)); var usages = What('Limited Feature Used ' + FieldNmbr); var DCmod = Number(usages) * 5; event.value = (isNaN(Number(usages)) || usages === '') ? 'DC  ' : 'DC ' + Number(10 + DCmod);

persistent rage.name: Persistent Rage
persistent rage.description: My rage only lasts less than 1 minute if I fall unconscious or I choose to end it

indomitable might.name: Indomitable Might
indomitable might.description: If a Strength check is lower than my Strength score, use Strength score instead

primal champion.name: Primal Champion
primal champion.description: +4 to Strength and Constitution; Their maximums increase to 24

Classes.name: Bard
Classes.equipment: Bard starting equipment: A rapier -or- a longsword -or- any simple weapon; A diplomat's pack -or- an entertainer's pack; A lute -or- any other musical instrument; Leather armor and a dagger. Alternatively, choose 5d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
spellcasting.description: I can cast bard cantrips/spells that I know, using Charisma as my spellcasting ability. I can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focus. I can cast my known bard spells as rituals if they have the ritual tag

bardic inspiration.name: Bardic Inspiration
bardic inspiration.description: As a bonus action, a creature in 60 ft that can hear me gets an inspiration die (max 1). For 10 min, the recipient can add it to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw. This addition can be done after seeing the d20 roll, but before knowing the outcome

jack of all trades.name: Jack of All Trades
jack of all trades.description: I can add half my proficiency bonus to any ability check that doesn't already include it

song of rest.name: Song of Rest
song of rest.description: Those that use HD and can hear my performance during a short rest get extra healing

subclassfeature3.name: Bard College
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a College that reflects your personality and put it in the Class field. Choose either the College of Lore or the College of Valor

expertise.name: Expertise
expertise.description: I gain expertise with two skills I am proficient with; two more at 10th level
expertise.skillstxt: Choose any two skill proficiencies, and two more at 10th level.

font of inspiration.name: Font of Inspiration
font of inspiration.description: I can now also recover my expended Bardic Inspiration uses after a short rest

countercharm.name: Countercharm
countercharm.description: As an action, I can do a performance that lasts until the end of my next turn. While it lasts, any friend in earshot & 30 ft has adv. on saves vs. frightened/charmed

magical secrets.name: Magical Secrets
magical secrets.description: I can add two spells/cantrips from any class to my spells known; +2 at level 14 & 18

superior inspiration.name: Superior Inspiration
superior inspiration.description: I regain one use of Bardic Inspiration if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

Classes.name: Cleric
skills: Choose two from History, Insight, Medicine, Persuasion, and Religion.
Classes.equipment: Cleric starting equipment: A mace -or- a warhammer (if proficient); Scale mail -or- leather armor -or- chain mail (if proficient); A light crossbow and 20 bolts -or- any simple weapon; A priest's pack -or- an explorer's pack; A shield and a holy symbol. Alternatively, choose 5d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
spellcasting.description: I can cast prepared cleric cantrips/spells, using Wisdom as my spellcasting ability. I can use a holy symbol as a spellcasting focus. I can cast my prepared cleric spells as rituals if they have the ritual tag

subclassfeature1.name: Divine Domain
subclassfeature1.description: Choose a Domain related to your deity and put it in the Class field on the first page. Choose either Arcana, Death, Life, Light, Nature, Tempest, Trickery, or War Domain

channel divinity.name: Channel Divinity
channel divinity.description: I can channel divine energy to cause an effect; the save for this is my cleric spell DC

turn undead.name: Channel Divinity: Turn Undead
turn undead.description: As an action, all undead within 30 ft that can see/hear me must make a Wisdom save. If an undead fails this save, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. Turned: move away, never within 30 ft of me, no reactions or actions other than Dash. Turned: may Dodge instead of Dash when nowhere to move and unable to escape bonds

destroy undead.name: Destroy Undead
destroy undead.description: An undead up to the CR above that fails its save when I use Turn Undead is destroyed

divine intervention.name: Divine Intervention
divine intervention.description: As an action, I can implore my deity for help; the DM determines the form of help. Without intervention, I can retry after a long rest; otherwise, I have to wait a week

Classes.name: Druid
skills: Choose two from Arcana, Animal Handling, Insight, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Religion, and Survival.
Classes.equipment: Druid starting equipment: A wooden shield -or- any simple weapon; A scimitar -or- any simple melee weapon; Leather armor, an explorer's pack, and a druidic focus. Alternatively, choose 2d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

druidic.name: Druidic
druidic.description: I know Druidic; Hidden messages with it can only be understood by who know Druidic

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
spellcasting.description: I can cast prepared druid cantrips/spells, using Wisdom as my spellcasting ability. I can use a druidic focus as a spellcasting focus. I can cast my prepared druid spells as rituals if they have the ritual tag

subclassfeature2.name: Druid Circle
subclassfeature2.description: Choose a Circle you can identify with and put it in the Class field on the first page. Choose either the Circle of the Land or the Circle of the Moon

subclassfeature2.wild shape.name: Wild Shape
subclassfeature2.wild shape.description: As an action, I assume the shape of a beast I have seen before with the following rules: I gain all its game statistics except Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma. I get its skill/saving throw prof. while keeping my own, using whichever is higher. I assume the beast's HP and HD; I get mine back when I revert back. I can't cast spells in beast form, but transforming doesn't break concentration. I retain features from class, race, etc., but I don't retain special senses. I can choose whether equipment falls to the ground, merges, or stays worn. I revert if out of time or unconscious; if KOd by damage, excess damage carries over

timeless body.name: Timeless Body
timeless body.description: I age more slowly, only 1 year for every 10 years that pass

beast spells.name: Beast Spells
beast spells.description: I can perform the somatic and verbal components of druid spells while in a beast shape

archdruid.name: Archdruid
archdruid.description: I can use Wild Shape an unlimited number of times. My druid spells don't require verbal, somatic, or free material components

Classes.name: Fighter
skills: Choose two from Acrobatics, Animal Handling, Athletics, History, Insight, Intimidation, Perception, and Survival.
Classes.equipment: Fighter starting equipment: Chain mail -or- leather armor, a longbow, and 20 arrows; A martial weapon and a shield -or- two martial weapons; A light crossbow and 20 bolts -or- two handaxes; A dungeoneer's pack -or- an explorer's pack. Alternatively, choose 5d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

fighting style.name: Fighting Style
fighting style.description: Choose a Fighting Style for the fighter using the "Choose Feature" button above

second wind.name: Second Wind
second wind.description: As a bonus action, I regain 1d10 + fighter level HP; I can use this once per short rest

action surge.name: Action Surge
action surge.description: I can take one additional action on my turn on top of my normally allowed actions

subclassfeature3.name: Martial Archetype
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a Martial Archetype you strive to emulate and put it in the Class field. Choose either Champion, Battle Master, Eldritch Knight, or Purple Dragon Knight

indomitable.name: Indomitable
indomitable.description: I can reroll a failed saving throw, but must keep the new result

Classes.name: Monk
skills: Choose two from Acrobatics, Athletics, History, Insight, Religion, and Stealth.
Classes.equipment:
Monk starting equipment: A shortsword -or- any simple weapon; A dungeoneer's pack -or- an explorer's pack; 10 darts.

Alternatively, choose 5d4 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

unarmored defense.name: Unarmored Defense
unarmored defense.description: Without armor and no shield, my AC is 10 + Dexterity modifier + Wisdom modifier

martial arts.name: Martial Arts
martial arts.description: Monk weapons: shortsword, simple weapon (not two-handed/heavy), unarmed strike. With these, I can use Dex instead of Str and use the Martial Arts damage die. When taking an Attack action with these, I get one unarmed strike as a bonus action
martial arts.eval: AddString('Extra.Notes', 'Monk features:\n\u25C6 Lose Unarmored Defense, Martial Arts, and Unarmored Movement with armor/shields', true);
martial arts.removeeval: RemoveString('Extra.Notes', 'Monk features:\n\u25C6 Lose Unarmored Defense, Martial Arts, and Unarmored Movement with armor/shields', true);

atkAdd: var monkDie = function(n) {return n < 5 ? 4 : n < 11 ? 6 : n < 17 ? 8 : 10;}; if (classes.known.monk && classes.known.monk.level && theWea && (theWea.monkweapon || (/shortsword/i).test(theWea.name) || (isMeleeWeapon && (/simple/i).test(theWea.type) && !(/\b(heavy|(2|two).?hand(ed)?s?)\b/i).test(theWea.description)))) {var aMonkDie = monkDie(classes.known.monk.level); try {var curDie = eval(fields.Damage_Die.replace('d', '*'));} catch (e) {var curDie = 'x';}; if (isNaN(curDie) || curDie < aMonkDie) {fields.Damage_Die = '1d' + aMonkDie;}; fields.Mod = StrDex;};

I can use either Strength or Dexterity and my Martial Arts damage die in place of the normal damage die for any 'Monk Weapons', which include unarmed strike, shortsword, and any simple melee weapon that is not two-handed or heavy.

ki.name: Ki
ki.description: I can spend ki to fuel special actions (see third page). I need to meditate for at least 30 min of a short rest for that short rest to restore ki

flurry of blows.name: Flurry of Blows
flurry of blows.description: [1 ki point] After taking the Attack action, I can make 2 unarmed attacks as a bonus action

patient defense.name: Patient Defense
patient defense.description: [1 ki point] As a bonus action, I can take the Dodge action

step of the wind.name: Step of the Wind
step of the wind.description: [1 ki point] As a bonus action, I can either Dash or Disengage; My jump distance doubles when I do so

stunning strike.name: Stunning Strike
stunning strike.description: [1 ki point] After I hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, I can spend a ki point to try to stun it. It has to succeed on a Con save or be stunned until the end of my next turn

ki.eval: ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'ki', 'flurry of blows', 'extra']); ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'ki', 'patient defense', 'extra']); ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'ki', 'step of the wind', 'extra']);
ki.removeeval: ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'ki', 'flurry of blows', 'extra'], 'remove'); ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'ki', 'patient defense', 'extra'], 'remove'); ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'ki', 'step of the wind', 'extra'], 'remove');
ki.changeeval: if (newClassLvl.monk >= 5 && (What('Extra.Notes') + What('Class Features')).toLowerCase().indexOf('stunning strike') === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'ki', 'stunning strike', 'extra'])} else if (newClassLvl.monk < 5 && oldClassLvl.monk >= 5) {ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'ki', 'stunning strike', 'extra'], 'remove');};

unarmored movement.name: Unarmored Movement
unarmored movement.description: Speed increases and eventually lets me traverse some surfaces without falling as I move
unarmored movement.additional: levels.map(function(n) {if (n< 2)return '';if (n< 6)return '+10 ft';if (n< 9)return '+15 ft';if (n< 10)return '+15 ft; Vertical surfaces and liquids';if (n< 14)return '+20 ft;Vertical surfaces and liquids';if (n< 18)return '+25 ft; Vertical surfaces and liquids';return '+30 ft; Vertical surfaces and liquids';})
unarmored movement.changeeval: var monkSpd = function(n) {return '+' + (n < 2 ? 0 : n < 6 ? 10 : n < 10 ? 15 : n < 14 ? 20 : n < 18 ? 25 : 30);}(classes.known.monk.level); SetProf('speed', monkSpd !== '+0', {allModes : monkSpd}, profDisplNm);

subclassfeature3.name: Monastic Tradition
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a Monastic Tradition to commit to and put it in the Class field on page 1. Choose either Way of the Four Elements, Long Death, Open Hand, Shadow, or Sun Soul

deflect missiles.name: Deflect Missiles
deflect missiles.description: As a reaction, I can reduce ranged weapon attack damage done to me. If the damage is negated, I catch and may throw it back (20/60 ft) as a monk weapon

slow fall.name: Slow Fall
slow fall.description: As a reaction, I can reduce any falling damage I take by five times my monk level

ki-empowered strikes.name: Ki-Empowered Strikes
ki-empowered strikes.description: My unarmed strikes count as magical for overcoming resistances and immunities

atkAdd: if ((/unarmed strike/i).test(WeaponName)) {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'Counts as magical';};
My unarmed strikes count as magical for overcoming resistances and immunities.

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description: My Dexterity saves vs. areas of effect negate damage on success and halve it on failure

text: Dex save vs. area effects: fail ― half dmg, success ― no dmg

stillness of mind.name: Stillness of Mind
stillness of mind.description: As an action, I can end one effect on me that causes me to be charmed or frightened

purity of body.name: Purity of Body
purity of body.description: My mastery of the ki flowing through me makes me immune to poison and disease: I am immune to poison and disease

tongue of the sun and moon.name: Tongue of the Sun and Moon
tongue of the sun and moon.description: I can understand all spoken languages and all creatures with a language understand me

diamond soul.name: Diamond Soul
diamond soul.description: I am proficient with all saves; I can reroll a failed save once by spending 1 ki point
diamond soul.additional: 1 ki point to reroll failed saving throw

timeless body.name: Timeless Body
timeless body.description: I don't require food or water; I don't suffer age penalties and can't be aged magically

empty body.name: Empty Body
empty body.description: Be invisible and resist non-force damage for 1 min or cast Astral Projection on self
empty body.additional: Invisible: 4 ki point; Astral Projection: 8 ki points

perfect self.name: Perfect Self
perfect self.description: I regain 4 ki points if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

Classes.name: Paladin
skills: Choose two from Athletics, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Persuasion, and Religion.
Classes.equipment: Paladin starting equipment: A martial weapon and a shield -or- two martial weapons; Five javelins -or- any simple melee weapon; A priest's pack -or- an explorer's pack; Chain mail and a holy symbol. Alternatively, choose 5d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

divine sense.name: Divine Sense
divine sense.description: As an action, I sense celestials/fiends/undead/consecrated/desecrated within 60 ft. Until the end of my next turn, I sense the type/location if it is not behind total cover

lay on hands.name: Lay on Hands
lay on hands.description: As an action, I can use points in my pool to heal a touched, living creature's hit points. I can neutralize poisons/diseases instead at a cost of 5 points per affliction

fighting style.name: Fighting Style
fighting style.description: Choose a Fighting Style for the paladin using the Choose Feature button above

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
spellcasting.description: I can cast prepared paladin spells, using Charisma as my spellcasting ability. I can use a holy symbol as a spellcasting focus

divine smite.name: Divine Smite
divine smite.description: When I hit someone in melee, I can expend spell slots to do 2d8 extra radiant damage. This increases by +1d8 for each spell slot level above 1st and +1d8 against undead/fiends

subclassfeature3.name: Sacred Oath
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a Sacred Oath you swear to and put it in the Class field on the first page. Choose Oath of the Ancients, Crown, Devotion, Vengeance, or become an Oathbreaker

divine health.name: Divine Health
divine health.description: I am immune to disease, thanks to the power of my faith

aura of protection.name: Aura of Protection
aura of protection.description: While I'm conscious, allies within range and I can add my Cha mod (min 1) to saves

addMod.text: While I'm conscious I can add my Charisma modifier (min 1) to all my saving throws.

aura of courage.name: Aura of Courage
aura of courage.description: While I'm conscious, allies within range and I can't be frightened

improved divine smite.name: Improved Divine Smite
improved divine smite.description: Whenever I hit a creature with a melee weapon, I do an extra 1d8 radiant damage

atkAdd: if (isMeleeWeapon) {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + '+1d8 Radiant damage'; };
With my melee weapon attacks I deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage.

cleansing touch.name: Cleansing Touch
cleansing touch.description: As an action, I can end one spell on me or another willing creature by touch

Classes.name: Ranger
skills: Choose three from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival
Choose one from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival
Classes.equipment: Ranger starting equipment: Scale mail -or- leather armor; Two shortswords -or- two simple melee weapons; A dungeoneer's pack -or- an explorer's pack; A longbow and a quiver of 20 arrows. Alternatively, choose 5d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

favored enemy.name: Favored Enemy
favored enemy.description: Use the Choose Feature button above to add a favored enemy to the third page. When selecting a favored enemy, I also learn one of the languages it speaks. I have adv. on Wis (Survival) checks to track and Int checks to recall info about them

natural explorer.name: Natural Explorer
natural explorer.description: Use the Choose Feature button above to add a favored terrain to the third page

arctic.name: Arctic
arctic.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning arctic terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in arctic terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic. I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food. If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace. When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

coast.name: Coast
coast.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning coast terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in coast terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic. I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food. If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace. When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

desert.name: Desert
desert.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning desert terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in desert terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic; I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food; If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace; When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

forest.name: Forest
forest.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning forest terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in forest terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic; I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food; If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace; When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

grassland.name: Grassland
grassland.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning grassland terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in grassland terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic; I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food; If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace; When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

mountain.name: Mountain
mountain.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning mountain terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in mountain terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic; I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food; If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace; When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

swamp.name: Swamp
swamp.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning swamp terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in swamp terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic; I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food; If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace; When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

underdark.name: Underdark
underdark.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning underdark terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in underdark terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic; I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food; If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace; When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

fighting style.name: Fighting Style
fighting style.description: Choose a Fighting Style for the ranger using the Choose Feature button above

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
spellcasting.description: I can cast ranger spells that I know, using Wisdom as my spellcasting ability

subclassfeature3.name: Ranger Archetype
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a Ranger Archetype you strive to emulate and put it in the Class field. Choose either Beast Master or Hunter

primeval awareness.name: Primeval Awareness
primeval awareness.description: As an action, I can use a spell slot to focus my awareness for 1 min per spell slot level. Out to 1 mile (6 in favored terrain), I sense if certain types of creatures are present

land's stride.name: Land's Stride
land's stride.description: I can travel through nonmagical, difficult terrain without penalty. I have advantage on saves vs. plants that impede movement by magical influence

hide in plain sight.name: Hide in Plain Sight
hide in plain sight.description: I can hide with +10 to Dex (Stealth) after spending 1 minute creating camouflage. Once I move or take an action or a reaction, the benefit is lost

vanish.name: Vanish
vanish.description: I can't be nonmagically tracked if I don't want to be and can Hide as a bonus action

feral senses.name: Feral Senses
feral senses.description: When not blinded or deafened, I'm aware of invisible, non-hidden creatures in 30 ft. I don't have disadvantage when attacking creatures I am aware of but can't see

foe slayer.name: Foe Slayer
foe slayer.description: Once per turn, I can add Wis mod to the attack or damage roll vs. favored enemy

Classes.name: Rogue
skills: Choose four from Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Performance, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth.
Choose one from Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Performance, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth.
Classes.equipment: Rogue starting equipment: A rapier -or- a shortsword; A shortbow and a quiver of 20 arrows -or- a shortswords; A burglar's pack -or- dungeoneer's pack -or- an explorer's pack; Leather armor, two daggers, and thieves' tools. Alternatively, choose 4d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

expertise.name: Expertise
expertise.description: I gain expertise with two skills/thieves' tools I am proficient with; two more at 6th level
expertise.skillstxt: Choose any two skill proficiencies and/or thieves' tools, and two more at 6th level.

sneak attack.name: Sneak Attack
sneak attack.description: Once per turn, I can add damage to finesse/ranged attack if I have advantage. I don't need adv. if a conscious ally is within 5 ft of the target and I don't have disadv.

atkAdd: if (classes.known.rogue && classes.known.rogue.level && !isSpell && ((/\bfinesse\b/i).test(fields.Description) || isRangedWeapon)) {var sneakAtk = Math.ceil(classes.known.rogue.level / 2); fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'Sneak attack ' + sneakAtk + 'd6'; };
Once per turn, when I attack with a ranged or finesse weapon while I have advantage or an conscious ally is within 5 ft of the target, I can add my sneak attack damage to the attack.

thieves cant.name: Thieves' Cant
thieves cant.description: I know the secret rogue language that I can use to convey messages inconspicuously

cunning action.name: Cunning Action
cunning action.description: I can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action

subclassfeature3.name: Roguish Archetype
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a Roguish Archetype you strive to emulate and put it in the Class field. Choose either Arcane Trickster, Assassin, Mastermind, Swashbuckler, or Thief

uncanny dodge.name: Uncanny Dodge
uncanny dodge.description: As a reaction, I halve the damage of an attack from an attacker that I can see

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description: My Dexterity saves vs. areas of effect negate damage on success and halve it on failure

text: Dex save vs. area effects: fail ― half dmg, success ― no dmg

reliable talent.name: Reliable Talent
reliable talent.description: If I make an ability check where I add my proficiency bonus, rolls of 9 or lower are 10

blindsense.name: Blindsense
blindsense.description: With my hearing, I can locate hidden or invisible creatures that are within 10 ft of me

slippery mind.name: Slippery Mind
slippery mind.description: I am proficient with Wisdom saving throws

elusive.name: Elusive
elusive.description: Attackers do not gain advantage on attacks vs. me, unless I am incapacitated

stroke of luck.name: Stroke of Luck
stroke of luck.description: I can turn a missed attack into a hit or a failed ability check into a natural 20

Classes.name: Sorcerer
skills: Choose two from Arcana, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Persuasion, and Religion.
Classes.equipment: Sorcerer starting equipment: A light crossbow and 20 bolts -or- any simple weapon; A component pouch -or- an arcane focus; A dungeoneer's pack -or- an explorer's pack; Two daggers. Alternatively, choose 3d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
spellcasting.description: I can cast sorcerer cantrips/spells that I know, using Charisma as my spellcasting ability. I can use an arcane focus as a spellcasting focus

subclassfeature1.name: Sorcerous Origin
subclassfeature1.description: Choose the Sorcerous Origin for your innate powers and put it in the Class field. Choose either Draconic Bloodline, Storm Sorcery, or Wild Magic

font of magic.name: Font of Magic
font of magic.description: As a bonus action, I can use sorcery points to create spell slots and vice versa. I can convert spell slots to sorcery points at a rate of 1 point per spell slot level. I can convert sorcery points to spell slots at the following rate: Level 1 for 2 sorcery points; level 2 for 3 sorcery points; level 3 for 5 sorcery points; Level 4 for 6 sorcery points; level 5 for 7 sorcery points

metamagic.name: Metamagic
metamagic.description: Use the Choose Feature button above to add a Metamagic option to the third page. I can use only 1 Metamagic option on a spell unless otherwise written

careful spell.name: Careful Spell
careful spell.description: [1 sorcery point] If the spell allows a saving throw, I can protect Cha modifier number of creatures. The selected creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws vs. the spell

distant spell.name: Distant Spell
distant spell.description: [1 sorcery point] I double the range of the spell or make the range 30 ft if the range was touch

empowered spell.name: Empowered Spell
empowered spell.description: [1 sorcery point] If the spell uses damage dice, I can reroll my Charisma modifier number of damage dice. I can Empower a spell even if I use another Metamagic option on it

extended spell.name: Extended Spell
extended spell.description: [1 sorcery point] If the spell has a duration of at least 1 min, I can double it, up to 24 hours

heightened spell.name: Heightened Spell
heightened spell.description: [3 sorcery points] If the spell allows a saving throw, I can have one target get disadv. on their first save

quickened spell.name: Quickened Spell
quickened spell.description: [2 sorcery points] If the spell has a casting time of 1 action, I can cast it as a bonus action

subtle spell.name: Subtle Spell
subtle spell.description: [1 sorcery point] I can cast the spell without the need to use somatic or verbal components

twinned spell.name: Twinned Spell
twinned spell.description: [1 sorcery point per spell level, minimum 1] If spell/cantrip has a target of one and not self, I can aim it at second target within range

sorcerous restoration.name: Sorcerous Restoration
sorcerous restoration.description: I regain 4 expended sorcery points whenever I finish a short rest

Classes.name: Warlock
skills: Choose two from Arcana, Deception, History, Intimidation, Investigation, Nature, and Religion.
Classes.equipment: Warlock starting equipment: A light crossbow and 20 bolts -or- any simple weapon; A component pouch -or- an arcane focus; A scholar's pack -or- a dungeoneer's pack Leather armor, any simple weapon, and two daggers. Alternatively, choose 4d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

pact magic.name: Pact Magic
pact magic.description: I can cast warlock cantrips/spells that I know, using Charisma as my spellcasting ability. I can use an arcane focus as a spellcasting focus. I regain these spell slots on a short rest

subclassfeature1.name: Otherworldly Patron
subclassfeature1.description: Choose the Otherworldly Patron you have a bargain with and put it in the Class field. Choose either the Archfey, the Fiend, the Great Old One, or the Undying

eldritch invocations.name: Eldritch Invocations
eldritch invocations.description: Use the Choose Feature button above to add Eldritch Invocations to the third page. Whenever I gain a warlock level, I can replace an invocation I know with another
extrachoices: Book of Ancient Secrets (prereq: Pact of the Tome)
Chains of Carceri (prereq: level 15 warlock, Pact of the Chain)
Lifedrinker (prereq: level 12 warlock, Pact of the Blade)
Master of Myriad Forms (prereq: level 15 warlock)
Sign of Ill Omen (prereq: level 5 warlock)
Thirsting Blade (prereq: level 5 warlock, Pact of the Blade)
Visions of Distant Realms (prereq: level 15 warlock)
Voice of the Chain Master (prereq: Pact of the Chain)
Whispers of the Grave (prereq: level 9 warlock)

agonizing blast (prereq: eldritch blast.name: Agonizing Blast
agonizing blast (prereq: eldritch blast.description: I can add my Charisma modifier to the damage of my Eldritch Blast cantrip
agonizing blast (prereq: eldritch blast.eval: var ES = (/eldritch spear/i).test(What('Extra.Notes') + What('Class Features')); RemoveWeapon('eldritch blast'); RemoveWeapon('eldritch spear'); RemoveWeapon('agonizing blast'); if (ES) {AddWeapon('Agonizing Spear')} else {AddWeapon('Agonizing Blast')}
agonizing blast (prereq: eldritch blast.removeeval: RemoveWeapon('agonizing blast'); RemoveWeapon('agonizing spear'); var ES = (/eldritch spear/i).test(What('Extra.Notes') + What('Class Features')); if (ES) {AddWeapon('Eldritch Spear')} else {AddWeapon('Eldritch Blast')}

armor of shadows.name: Armor of Shadows
armor of shadows.description: I can cast Mage Armor on myself at will, without spell slots or material comp. (PHB 256)

ascendant step (prereq: level 9 warlock).name: Ascendant Step
ascendant step (prereq: level 9 warlock).description: I can cast Levitate on myself at will, without spell slots or material comp. (PHB 255)

beast speech.name: Beast Speech
beast speech.description: I can cast Speak with Animals at will, without using spell slots (PHB 277)

beguiling influence.name: Beguiling Influence
beguiling influence.description: I gain proficiencies with the Deception and Persuasion skills

bewitching whispers (prereq: level 7 war.name: Bewitching Whispers
bewitching whispers (prereq: level 7 war.description: Once per long rest, I can cast Compulsion using a warlock spell slot (PHB 224)

book of ancient secrets (prereq: pact of.name: Book of Ancient Secrets
book of ancient secrets (prereq: pact of.description: I can add any two 1st-level spells that have the ritual tag to my Book of Shadows. If I come across spells with the ritual tag, I can transcribe them into my book, as well. I can cast any of these spells in my Book of Shadows as rituals, but not as normal spells. I can cast my known warlock spells as rituals if they have the ritual tag
book of ancient secrets (prereq: pact of.eval: CurrentSpells['book of ancient secrets'] = {name : 'Book of Ancient Secrets', ability : 6, list : {class : 'any', ritual : true}, known : {spells : 'book'}}; SetStringifieds();
book of ancient secrets (prereq: pact of.removeeval: delete CurrentSpells['book of ancient secrets']; SetStringifieds();
book of ancient secrets (prereq: pact of.prereqeval: classes.known.warlock.level >= 3 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf('warlock,pact boon,pact of the tome') !== -1

chains of carceri (prereq: level 15 warl.name: Chains of Carceri
chains of carceri (prereq: level 15 warl.description: I can cast Hold Monster at will if the target is a celestial, fiend, or elemental (PHB 251). This uses no spell slots/material comp.; I can only target an individual once per long rest
chains of carceri (prereq: level 15 warl.prereqeval: classes.known.warlock.level >= 15 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf('warlock,pact boon,pact of the chain') !== -1

devil's sight.name: Devil's Sight
devil's sight.description: I can see in magical and nonmagical darkness out to 120 ft

dreadful word (prereq: level 7 warlock).name: Dreadful Word
dreadful word (prereq: level 7 warlock).description: Once per long rest, I can cast Confusion using a warlock spell slot (PHB 224)

eldritch sight.name: Eldritch Sight
eldritch sight.description: I can cast Detect Magic at will, without using spell slots (PHB 231)

eldritch spear (prereq: eldritch blast c.name: Eldritch Spear
eldritch spear (prereq: eldritch blast c.description: My Eldritch Blast cantrip has a range of 300 ft
eldritch spear (prereq: eldritch blast c.eval: var AB = (/agonizing blast/i).test(What('Extra.Notes') + What('Class Features')); RemoveWeapon('eldritch blast'); RemoveWeapon('eldritch spear'); RemoveWeapon('agonizing blast'); if (AB) {AddWeapon('Agonizing Spear')} else {AddWeapon('Eldritch Spear')}
eldritch spear (prereq: eldritch blast c.removeeval: RemoveWeapon('eldritch spear'); RemoveWeapon('agonizing spear'); var AB = (/agonizing blast/i).test(What('Extra.Notes') + What('Class Features')); RemoveWeapon('eldritch blast'); if (AB) {AddWeapon('Agonizing Blast')} else {AddWeapon('Eldritch Blast')}

fiendish vigor.name: Fiendish Vigor
fiendish vigor.description: I can cast False Life on myself at will, without spell slots or material comp. (PHB 239)

gaze of two minds.name: Gaze of Two Minds
gaze of two minds.description: As an action, I can touch a willing creature and perceive through its senses (not my own). This lasts until the end of my next turn, but I can use an action to extend the duration

lifedrinker (prereq: level 12 warlock, p.name: Lifedrinker
lifedrinker (prereq: level 12 warlock, p.description: My pact weapon does extra necrotic damage equal to my Charisma modifier

atkCalc: if (isMeleeWeapon && (/\bpact\b/i).test(WeaponText)) { output.extraDmg += What('Cha Mod'); };

If I include the word 'Pact' in a melee weapon's name or description, the calculation will add my Charisma modifier to its damage. However, it won't say that this added damage is of the necrotic type, as it can only display a single damage type.

lifedrinker (prereq: level 12 warlock, p.prereqeval: classes.known.warlock.level >= 12 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf('warlock,pact boon,pact of the blade') !== -1

mask of many faces.name: Mask of Many Faces
mask of many faces.description: I can cast Disguise Self on myself at will, without using spell slots (PHB 233)

master of myriad forms (prereq: level 15.name: Master of Myriad Forms
master of myriad forms (prereq: level 15.description: I can cast Alter Self on myself at will, without using spell slots (PHB 211)

minions of chaos (prereq: level 9 warloc.name: Minions of Chaos
minions of chaos (prereq: level 9 warloc.description: Once per long rest, I can cast Conjure Elemental using a warlock spell slot (PHB 225)

mire the mind (prereq: level 5 warlock).name: Mire the Mind
mire the mind (prereq: level 5 warlock).description: Once per long rest, I can cast Slow using a warlock spell slot (PHB 277)

misty visions.name: Misty Visions
misty visions.description: I can cast Silent Image at will, without using spell slots or material comp. (PHB 276)

one with shadows (prereq: level 5 warloc.name: One with Shadows
one with shadows (prereq: level 5 warloc.description: As an action, when I'm in an area of dim light or darkness, I can become invisible. I become visible again when I move or take an action or reaction

otherworldly leap (prereq: level 9 warlo.name: Otherworldly Leap
otherworldly leap (prereq: level 9 warlo.description: I can cast Jump on myself at will, without using spell slots or material comp. (PHB 254)

repelling blast (prereq: eldritch blast.name: Repelling Blast
repelling blast (prereq: eldritch blast.description: I can have creatures hit by my Eldritch Blast cantrip be pushed 10 ft away from me

atkAdd: if (theWea && (/eldritch blast/i).test(theWea.name)) {fields.Description += '; Target pushed back 10 ft'; };
When I hit a creature with my Eldritch Blast cantrip, it is pushed 10 ft away from me.

sculptor of flesh (prereq: level 7 warlo.name: Sculptor of Flesh
sculptor of flesh (prereq: level 7 warlo.description: Once per long rest, I can cast Polymorph using a warlock spell slot (PHB 266)

sign of ill omen (prereq: level 5 warloc.name: Sign of Ill Omen
sign of ill omen (prereq: level 5 warloc.description: Once per long rest, I can cast Bestow Curse using a warlock spell slot (PHB 218)

thief of five fates.name: Thief of Five Fates
thief of five fates.description: Once per long rest, I can cast Bane using a warlock spell slot (PHB 216)

thirsting blade (prereq: level 5 warlock.name: Thirsting Blade
thirsting blade (prereq: level 5 warlock.description: When taking the attack action, I can attack twice with my pact weapon
thirsting blade (prereq: level 5 warlock.eval: AddAction('action', 'Pact Weapon (2 attacks per action)', 'Thirsting Blade (warlock invocation)');
thirsting blade (prereq: level 5 warlock.prereqeval: classes.known.warlock.level >= 5 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf('warlock,pact boon,pact of the blade') !== -1

visions of distant realms (prereq: level.name: Visions of Distant Realms
visions of distant realms (prereq: level.description: I can cast Arcane Eye at will, without using spell slots (PHB 214)

voice of the chain master (prereq: pact.name: Voice of the Chain Master
voice of the chain master (prereq: pact.description: While on the same plane as my familiar, I can communicate telepathically with it. Also, I can perceive through its senses and have it speak with my voice while doing so
voice of the chain master (prereq: pact.prereqeval: classes.known.warlock.level >= 3 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf('warlock,pact boon,pact of the chain') !== -1

whispers of the grave (prereq: level 9 w.name: Whispers of the Grave
whispers of the grave (prereq: level 9 w.description: I can cast Speak with Dead at will, without using spell slots (PHB 277)

witch sight (prereq: level 15 warlock).name: Witch Sight
witch sight (prereq: level 15 warlock).description: I can see the true form of creatures (shapechangers/illusions/transmutations) within 30 ft

pact boon.name: Pact Boon
pact boon.description: Choose a Pact Boon (Blade, Chain, or Tome) using the Choose Feature button above

pact of the blade.name: Pact of the Blade
pact of the blade.description: As an action, I can create a pact weapon in my empty hand; I'm proficient in its use. I can choose the type of melee weapon every time I create it, and it has those statistics. The weapon disappears if it is more than 5 ft away from me for 1 minute. The weapon counts as magical; I can transform a magic weapon into my pact weapon. This occurs over an hour-long ritual that I can perform during a short rest. I can use an action to re-summon it in any form and can dismiss it as no action

atkAdd: if (WeaponName === 'moon bow' || (isMeleeWeapon && (/\bpact\b/i).test(WeaponText))) {fields.Proficiency = true; fields.Description += thisWeapon[1] ? '' : (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'Counts as magical'; };
If I include the word 'Pact' in a melee weapon's name, it gets treated as my Pact Weapon.

pact of the chain.name: Pact of the Chain
pact of the chain.description: I can cast Find Familiar as a ritual (PHB 240); Also Imp/Pseudodragon/Quasit/Sprite. When taking the attack action, I can forgo 1 attack to have my familiar attack instead. It makes this 1 attack by using its reaction

pact of the tome.name: Pact of the Tome
pact of the tome.description: I have a Book of Shadows with any three cantrips of my choosing. I can cast these cantrips as long as I have the book on my person. Regardless of the lists they come from, these count as warlock cantrips to me. I can get a replacement book with a 1-hour ceremony during a short or long rest

mystic arcanum.name: Mystic Arcanum
mystic arcanum.description: I can choose one spell from the warlock spell list of each level mentioned above. I can cast these spells each once per long rest without needing to use a spell slot
mystic arcanum.changeeval: if (classes.known.warlock.level < 13) {delete CurrentSpells.warlock.bonus['mystic arcanum (7)']} else {if (!CurrentSpells.warlock.bonus['mystic arcanum (7)']) {CurrentSpells.warlock.bonus['mystic arcanum (7)'] = {name : 'Mystic Arcanum (7)', class : 'warlock', level : [7, 7], oncelr : true}}}; if (classes.known.warlock.level < 15) {delete CurrentSpells.warlock.bonus['mystic arcanum (8)']} else {if (!CurrentSpells.warlock.bonus['mystic arcanum (8)']) {CurrentSpells.warlock.bonus['mystic arcanum (8)'] = {name : 'Mystic Arcanum (8)', class : 'warlock', level : [8, 8], oncelr : true}}}; if (classes.known.warlock.level < 17) {delete CurrentSpells.warlock.bonus['mystic arcanum (9)']} else {if (!CurrentSpells.warlock.bonus['mystic arcanum (9)']) {CurrentSpells.warlock.bonus['mystic arcanum (9)'] = {name : 'Mystic Arcanum (9)', class : 'warlock', level : [9, 9], oncelr : true}}}

eldritch master.name: Eldritch Master
eldritch master.description: I can regain all used pact magic spells slots by spending 1 minute entreating my patron

Classes.name: Wizard
skills: Choose two from Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Medicine, and Religion.
Classes.equipment:
Wizard starting equipment: A quarterstaff -or- a dagger; A component pouch -or- an arcane focus; A scholar's pack -or- an explorer's pack; A spellbook.

Alternatively, choose 4d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
spellcasting.description: I can cast prepared wizard cantrips/spells, using Intelligence as my spellcasting ability. I can use an arcane focus as a spellcasting focus. I can cast all wizard spells in my spellbook as rituals if they have the ritual tag

arcane recovery.name: Arcane Recovery
arcane recovery.description: Once per day after a short rest, I can recover a number of 5th-level or lower spell slots

subclassfeature2.name: Arcane Tradition
subclassfeature2.description: Choose the Arcane Tradition you studied and put it in the Class field. Choose either the School of Abjuration, Conjuration, Divination, Enchantment, Evocation, Illusion, Necromancy, or Transmutation, or become a Bladesinger

spell mastery.name: Spell Mastery
spell mastery.description: By spending 8 hours in study, I can pick a 1st and 2nd-level spell in my spellbook. While prepared, I can cast them at their lowest levels without expending spell slots

signature spell.name: Signature Spell
signature spell.description: Two 3rd-level spells of my choice in my spellbook will always count as prepared. I can cast both at third level once per short rest without expending spell slots

subclassfeature3.name: Frenzy
subclassfeature3.description: Melee attack as bonus action each turn while raging; +1 level of exhaustion after rage

subclassfeature6.name: Mindless Rage
subclassfeature6.description: While raging, I can't be charmed or frightened, and such effects are suspended

text: Immune to being charmed/frightened in rage

subclassfeature10.name: Intimidating Presence
subclassfeature10.description: As an action, frighten one creature in 30 ft for one turn if it fails a Wisdom save. This effect ends if the creature is out of line of sight or more than 60 ft away. If a creature succeeds its saving throw, it is immune for 24 hours

subclassfeature14.name: Retaliation
subclassfeature14.description: When an enemy within 5 ft damages me, I can make a melee attack as a reaction

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with three skills of my choice

subclassfeature3.1.name: Cutting Words
subclassfeature3.1.description: As a reaction, when a foe within earshot & 60 ft rolls ability check, attack or damage, I can subtract a Bardic Inspiration die from the result unless the foe can't be charmed

subclassfeature6.name: Additional Magical Secrets
subclassfeature6.description: I can add two spells/cantrips from any class to my Spells Known

subclassfeature14.name: Peerless Skill
subclassfeature14.description: When making an ability check, I can expend a use of Bardic Inspiration to add the die

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with heavy armor

subclassfeature1.1.name: Disciple of Life
subclassfeature1.1.description: When I use a spell that restores hit points, it restores an additional 2 + spell level

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Preserve Life
subclassfeature2.description: As an action, I can heal any creature within 30 ft of me up to half their maximum HP. I divide the number of hit points among the creatures as I see fit

subclassfeature6.name: Blessed Healer
subclassfeature6.description: When I restore HP to another with a spell, I regain 2 + the spell's level in HP

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: if (classes.known.cleric && classes.known.cleric.level > 7 && !isSpell) {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'Once per turn +' + (classes.known.cleric.level < 14 ? 1 : 2) + 'd8 radiant damage'; };
Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra radiant damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Supreme Healing
subclassfeature17.description: When I restore HP with a spell, I heal the maximum amount instead of rolling the dice

subclassfeature2.name: Bonus Cantrip
subclassfeature2.description: I know one additional druid cantrip of my choice

subclassfeature2.1.name: Natural Recovery
subclassfeature2.1.description: After a short rest, I can recover a number of 5th-level or lower spell slots

subclassfeature3.name: Circle Spells
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a terrain that grants you spells using the "Choose Feature" button above

arctic.name: Arctic Circle Spells
arctic.description: My mystical connection to the arctic infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells. These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

subclassfeature6.name: Land's Stride
subclassfeature6.description: I can travel through nonmagical, difficult terrain without penalty. I have advantage on saves vs. plants that impede movement by magical influence

subclassfeature10.name: Nature's Ward
subclassfeature10.description: I am immune to poison/disease and I can't be charmed/frightened by elementals or fey

text: Immune to being charmed or frightened by elementals or fey

subclassfeature14.name: Nature's Sanctuary
subclassfeature14.description: When a beast or plant attacks me, it must make a Wis save or pick a different target. If it can't, it automatically misses; On a successful save, it is immune for 24 hours

subclassfeature3.name: Improved Critical
subclassfeature3.description: I score a critical hit with my weapon attacks on a roll of 19 and 20

atkAdd: if (!isSpell && classes.known.fighter && classes.known.fighter.level > 2 && classes.known.fighter.level < 15 && !CritChance) {var CritChance = 19; fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'Crit on 19-20'; };
My weapon attacks score a critical on a to hit roll of both 19 and 20.

subclassfeature7.name: Remarkable Athlete
subclassfeature7.description: I add half my proficiency bonus to Str/Dex/Con checks if I would otherwise add none. When making running jumps, I add my Strength modifier to the distance in feet

subclassfeature10.name: Additional Fighting Style
subclassfeature10.description: Choose an Additional Fighting Style using the Choose Feature button above

subclassfeature15.name: Superior Critical
subclassfeature15.description: I score a critical hit with my weapon attacks on a roll of 18, 19, and 20

atkAdd: if (!isSpell && classes.known.fighter && classes.known.fighter.level > 14) {if (CritChance) {fields.Description = CritChance <= 18 ? fields.Description : fields.Description.replace('Crit on ' + CritChance + '-20', 'Crit on 18-20'); } else {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'Crit on 18-20'; }; var CritChance = 18; };
My weapon attacks also score a critical on a to hit roll of 18.

subclassfeature18.name: Survivor
subclassfeature18.description: At the start of my turn, if I'm not above half or at 0 HP, I regain 5 + Con mod HP

subclassfeature3.name: Hand Technique
subclassfeature3.description: Whenever I hit a creature with a Flurry of Blows attack I can do one of the following: Have it make a Dexterity save or be knocked prone; Have it make a Strength save or be pushed up to 15 ft away from me; Stop it from taking reactions until the end of my next turn;

subclassfeature6.name: Wholeness of Body
subclassfeature6.description: As an action, I regain hit points equal to three times my monk level

subclassfeature11.name: Tranquility
subclassfeature11.description: After a long rest, I gain the effect of a Sanctuary spell until a next long rest (PHB 272)
subclassfeature11.changeeval: if (newClassLvl.monk >= 17 && (What('Extra.Notes') + What('Class Features')).toLowerCase().indexOf('quivering palm') === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature11', 'quivering palm', 'extra'])} else if (newClassLvl.monk < 17 && oldClassLvl.monk >= 17) {ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature11', 'quivering palm', 'extra'], 'remove')

quivering palm.name: Quivering Palm
quivering palm.description: [3 ki points] When I hit a creature with an unarmed strike, I can start imperceptible vibrations. Within my monk level in days, I can use an action to have the creature make a Con save. If it fails, it is reduced to 0 hit points; If it succeeds, it takes 10d10 necrotic damage

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Sacred Weapon
subclassfeature3.description: As an action, for 1 minute, I add my Cha modifier to hit for one weapon I'm holding. It also counts as magical and emits bright light in a 20-ft radius and equal dim light

atkCalc: if (classes.known.paladin && classes.known.paladin.level > 2 && !isSpell && (/^(?=.*sacred)(?=.*weapon).*$/i).test(WeaponText)) { output.extraHit += What('Cha Mod'); };
If I include the words 'Sacred Weapon' in the name or description of a weapon, it gets my Charisma modifier added to its To Hit.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Turn the Unholy
subclassfeature3.1.description: As an action, all fiends/undead within 30 ft that can hear me must make a Wis save. If one of them fails this save, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes damage. Turned: move away, never within 30 ft of me, no reactions or actions other than Dash. Turned: may Dodge instead of Dash when nowhere to move and unable to escape bonds

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Devotion
subclassfeature7.description: While I'm conscious, allies within range and I can't be charmed

subclassfeature15.name: Purity of Spirit
subclassfeature15.description: I am always under the effect of a Protection from Evil and Good spell (PHB 270)

subclassfeature20.name: Holy Nimbus
subclassfeature20.description: As an action, I shine with a 30-ft radius bright light and equal dim light for 1 minute. If an enemy starts its turn in the bright light, it takes 10 radiant damage. For the duration, I have advantage on saves vs. spells cast by fiends and undead

subclassfeature3.name: Hunter's Prey
subclassfeature3.description: Choose Colossus Slayer, Giant Killer, or Horde Breaker with the "Choose Feature" button

colossus slayer.name: Hunter's Prey: Colossus Slayer
colossus slayer.description: Once per turn, when hitting someone that is below max HP, I do an extra 1d8 damage

giant killer.name: Hunter's Prey: Giant Killer
giant killer.description: As a reaction, when a Large or larger enemy in 5 ft attacks me, I can attack it once

horde breaker.name: Hunter's Prey: Horde Breaker
horde breaker.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature, I can make an attack vs. another within 5 ft of it

subclassfeature7.name: Defensive Tactics
subclassfeature7.description: Choose Feature button to choose Escape the Horde, Multiattack Defense, or Steel Will

escape the horde.name: Defensive Tactic: Escape the Horde
escape the horde.description: Creatures attacking me with opportunity attacks have disadvantage on the attack rolls

multiattack defense.name: Defensive Tactic: Multiattack Defense
multiattack defense.description: When a creature hits me, I gain +4 AC against that creature for the rest of the turn

steel will.name: Defensive Tactic: Steel Will
steel will.description: I have advantage on saves against being frightened

subclassfeature11.name: Multiattack
subclassfeature11.description: Choose Volley or Whirlwind Attack using the Choose Feature button above

volley.name: Multiattack: Volley
volley.description: As an action, I can make ranged attacks vs. all within a 10-ft radius of a point in range

whirlwind attack.name: Multiattack: Whirlwind Attack
whirlwind attack.description: As an action, I can make melee attacks vs. all creatures within 5 ft of me

subclassfeature15.name: Superior Hunter's Defense
subclassfeature15.description: Choose Feature button to choose Evasion, Stand Against the Tide, or Uncanny Dodge

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description: My Dexterity saves vs. areas of effect negate damage on success and halve it on failure

text: Dex save vs. area effects: fail ― half dmg, success ― no dmg

stand against the tide.name: Stand Against the Tide
stand against the tide.description: When a creature misses me with a melee attack, I can use my reaction on the attack. I force the attacker to repeat it vs. another (not attacker) of my choice within range

uncanny dodge.name: Uncanny Dodge
uncanny dodge.description: As a reaction, I halve the damage of an attack from an attacker that I can see

subclassfeature3.name: Fast Hands
subclassfeature3.description: As a bonus action, I can do one of the following: Make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check; Use my thieves' tools to disarm a trap or open a lock; Take the Use an Object action

subclassfeature3.1.name: Second-Story Work
subclassfeature3.1.description: I climb at my normal speed; I add my Dex modifier to the distance of a running jump

subclassfeature9.name: Supreme Sneak
subclassfeature9.description: I have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks when moving no more than half speed

subclassfeature13.name: Use Magic Device
subclassfeature13.description: I can use magic items even if I don't meet the class, race, and/or level requirements

subclassfeature17.name: Thief's Reflexes
subclassfeature17.description: Unless surprised, I can take two turns on the first round of any combat. The first turn is at my regular initiative, and the second is at my initiative - 10

subclassfeature1.name: Dragon Ancestor
subclassfeature1.description: Choose a Dragon Ancestor using the Choose Feature button above. When interacting with dragons, if I can add my proficiency bonus, I can double it

black dragon ancestor.name: Black Dragon Ancestor
black dragon ancestor.description: I have draconic ancestry with black dragons, which are affiliated with acid damage. When interacting with dragons, if I can add my proficiency bonus, I can double it

subclassfeature1.1.name: Draconic Resilience
subclassfeature1.1.description: When I am not wearing armor, my AC is 13 + Dexterity modifier. My hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to my sorcerer level

calcChanges.hp: if (classes.known.sorcerer) {extrahp += classes.known.sorcerer.level; extrastring += '\n + ' + classes.known.sorcerer.level + ' from Draconic Resilience (Sorcerer)'; };

subclassfeature6.name: Elemental Affinity
subclassfeature6.description: Choose a Dragon Ancestor using the Choose Feature button above. I add Cha mod for spell damage if matching my dragon ancestor's affiliated type. I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain resistance to my dragon ancestor's affiliated type

acid.name: Acid Elemental Affinity
acid.description: [1 sorcery point] I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does acid damage. When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain acid resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: if (classes.known.sorcerer && classes.known.sorcerer.level > 5 && isSpell && (/acid/i).test(fields.Damage_Type)) { output.extraDmg += What('Cha Mod'); };

subclassfeature6.eval: if (FeaChoice === '') {var CFrem = What('Class Features Remember'); var tReg = /.*?sorcerer,subclassfeature1,((black|blue|brass|bronze|copper|gold|green|red|silver|white) dragon ancestor).*/i; if ((tReg).test(CFrem)) {FeaChoice = CurrentClasses.sorcerer.features.subclassfeature1[CFrem.replace(tReg, '$1')].dragonElement; AddString('Class Features Remember', 'sorcerer,subclassfeature6,' + FeaChoice, false);};};

subclassfeature14.name: Dragon Wings
subclassfeature14.description: As a bonus action, unless armor is in the way, I can sprout dragon wings from my back. I gain a fly speed equal to my current speed until I dismiss the wings as a bonus action

subclassfeature18.name: Draconic Presence
subclassfeature18.description: As an action, I create 60-ft radius aura of awe/fear for concentration up to 1 minute. All hostiles in this aura must make a Wis save or be charmed (awe) or frightened (fear). They make their saves at the beginning of their turns. A creature that succeeds on the save is immune to my aura for 24 hours

subclassfeature1.name: Dark One's Blessing
subclassfeature1.description: When I reduce a hostile to 0 HP, I gain Cha mod + warlock level temporary HP (min 1)

subclassfeature6.name: Dark One's Own Luck
subclassfeature6.description: When I make an ability check or saving throw, I can add 1d10 after rolling the d20

subclassfeature10.name: Fiendish Resilience
subclassfeature10.description: After a short or long rest, I can choose one damage type to become resistance to. This lasts until I choose another type; Magical and silver weapons ignore this resistance

subclassfeature14.name: Hurl Through Hell
subclassfeature14.description: When I hit a creature with an attack, I can instantly transport it through lower planes. It returns at the end of my next turn and takes 10d10 psychic damage if not a fiend

subclassfeature2.name: Evocation Savant
subclassfeature2.description: I halve the gp and time needed to copy evocation spells into my spellbook

subclassfeature2.1.name: Sculpt Spells
subclassfeature2.1.description: If I cast an evocation spell affecting others I can see, I can protect 1 + the spell's level. The chosen automatically succeed on their saving throws vs. the spell. They also take no damage if the spell would normally deal half damage on a save

subclassfeature6.name: Potent Cantrip
subclassfeature6.description: Any cantrips I cast still deal half damage on a successful save

subclassfeature10.name: Empowered Evocation
subclassfeature10.description: I can add my Int modifier to a single damage roll of any wizard evocation spell I cast

subclassfeature14.name: Overchannel
subclassfeature14.description: When I cast a 5th-level or lower wizard spell that damages, it can deal max damage. Except the first time I do this after a long rest, I suffer 2d12 necrotic dmg per spell lvl. Every time I do it after that, before a long rest, I take another 1d12 necrotic damage. This necrotic damage surpasses my resistances/immunities; I can't overchannel cantrips
